courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
requirements: Basic understanding of computers and the internet
Access to a computer with an internet connection

courses.title: Python Programming for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of Python programming language from scratch.
requirements: Basic understanding of computers and the internet
Access to a computer with an internet connection

courses.title: Data Science with Python
courses.description: Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with Python.
